Ezhu is a platform that connects skilled workers with investors and users to create opportunities, collaboration, and growth in Sri Lanka.
To register, visit our signup page and choose your role: User, Skilled Worker, or Investor.

patterns: I want to fund a project
responses: As an investor, you can explore skilled worker portfolios, view proposals, and connect directly through Ezhu to fund or support initiatives.

patterns: Can I join as a worker?
responses: Skilled workers can create profiles, showcase their work, and connect with investors or users who need their skills.
You can search for skilled workers based on category or skill, and message them directly through the platform.
Ezhu offers user profiles, chat, proposal submission, investment management, and a social feed to showcase work and collaboration.
Ezhu follows standard security protocols and encrypts personal data to ensure safe and trusted communication between users.
The Feed allows skilled workers to post updates, share project progress, and connect with investors and users through their work stories.
Admins manage users, moderate content, handle disputes, and make sure Ezhu is running smoothly for everyone.

Verification builds trust! Upload your documents or ID from the profile settings, and we’ll review and approve your status.
Ezhu supports secure payments through Stripe. Users and investors can send and receive funds directly in the platform.
Please contact our support team or use the Report Issue option in your dashboard. We'll help you out as fast as possible!

patterns: How do I change my password?
responses: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password securely.

responses: We are working on multi-language support including Tamil and Sinhala to make Ezhu more inclusive!

patterns: How do I delete my account?
responses: You can delete your account by going to your profile settings and choosing the 'Delete Account' option. Be careful—this action is permanent.
